tool_description: Amazon Data provides you with comprehensive information about products on Amazon, including pricing, customer reviews, product descriptions, and more. With this valuable data, you can make informed decisions about your online retail strategy and stay ahead of the competition
name: Amazon Data_v2
title: Amazon Data

api_list.name: Categories List
api_list.description: This endpoint point fetches categories of Amazon!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-data6.p.rapidapi.com/categories-list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-data6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: MarketPlace List
api_list.description: This endpoint lists down the market places we use to fetch data!
